wikipedia_page.main: Cecil Lake (born 22 November 1965) is a Montserratian professional footballer and manager.

response: Cecil Lake is a settlement in British Columbia.BC Names/GeoBC entry "Cecil Lake"

Cecil Lake is a farming community 20 minutes east of Fort Saint John. It was  made available for homesteading during the 1930s many families settled in the area during that time. The land was cleared for farming, roads, houses, schools and churches were also built at that time. The area was considered remote because of the poor roads then. A road and bridge across the Beatton River existed through the 1950s and 60s. Due to problems with the banks of the river sliding the road was relocated and the bridge replaced with two bridges in the 1990s.  Cecil Lake has two churches, a post office/general store, and a community hall.

The community is named after the nearby Cecil Lake, which was believed to have been named in 1910 for Cecil Morton Roberts, who was chief draughtsman at the Surveyor-General's Branch of the British Columbia Department of Lands in 1910.BC Names/GeoBC entry "Cecil Lake (lake)"
